name: robots_dvd
description: In a world populated entirely by robots, a young, idealist inventor sets off for Robot City to make his mark on the world. Once he arrives, he is confronted with a reality that is nothing like his dreams and aspirations. Actors: Ewan McGregor, Halle Berry, Mel Brooks, Robin Williams, Paula Abdul. Directors: Carlos Saldanha, Chris Wedge. Writers: Babaloo Mandel, David Lindsay-Abaire, Jim McClain, Lowell Ganz, Ron Mita. Producers: Bob Gordon. Movie Genre: Kids and Family. Format: Multiple Formats, Animated, Closed-captioned, Color, Dolby, DTS Surround Sound, Dubbed, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen. Language: English (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (DTS 5.1), French (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround), Spanish (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround). Subtitles: English, Spanish. Dubbed: English, French, Spanish. Region: Region 1 (U.S. and Canada only. Read more about DVD formats.) Aspect Ratio: 1.85:1. Number of discs: 1. Rated: PG Parental Guidance Suggested. Studio: 20th Century Fox
